problem.p: A thin rod of mass M and length D is at rest on a horizontal and frictionless table contained in the (x,y) axis. A small circular block of mass M initially traveling along the +x axis with a speed v hits one of the ends of the rod. After the collision, the small block's final speed is 3v/4 (along the +x axis). What is the rod's angular velocity after the collision? (Gravity is into the screen).

hintgroup.p: Hint: consider where should you put your axis.
